Name: Hive Tyrant
Description: Powerful highly adaptive synapse unit**Can attack ground units**
Subtitle: Hive Fleet Genesis

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Reduces the damage of enemy units in radius 8 of the Hive Tyrant by 30% for 15 seconds. 50 second cooldown. 10% chance to inflict shattered mind reducing damage and move speed by  50% and inflicting confusion on enemy
Root.Name: Psychic Scream

Root.Tooltip: Units within health synapse range have there max heath raised by 25%
Root.Name: Health Synapse

Root.Tooltip: Deals 15 damage in radius 8 of the Hive Tyrant. The ground in radius 6 becomes poisoned for the next 10 seconds, doing 6 damage every second to enemy ground units. 65 second cooldown. 10% chance to inflict aftershock stunning ground units for 5 seconds
Root.Name: Seismic Roar
